#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <limits.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
  int n, q;
  long long t, temp;
  scanf("%d %d", &n, &q);
  long long mi = LLONG_MAX;
  long long ma = 0;
  
  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
    scanf("%lld", &temp);
    mi = std::min(mi, temp);
    ma = std::max(ma, temp);
  }

  for (int i = 0; i < q; ++i) {
    scanf("%lld", &t);
    if (t >= mi && t <= ma) printf("Yes\n");
    else printf("No\n");
  }
  
  return 0;
}
